item.title: Apple Mach-O File
item.description: Intro Using otool we can get general info about the Mach-O file: otool -h [app_name] > Mach header magic cputype cpusubtype caps filetype ncmds sizeofcmds flags 0xfeedfacf 16777228 0 0x00 2 115 11384 0x00218085 Quick refernce on the meaning:

item.title: Reverse Engineering iOS Applications üçè
item.description: During forensic analysis it’s not too rare to run into some suspicious application. In this article I’m going to learn to reverse engineer iOS applications.

item.title: Crackme Algorithm
item.description: Look at the strings fs strings and f in radare2 or rabin -zz Find xrefs for the strings of interest axt @ str.

item.title: Reverse Engineering Android Applications ü§ñ
item.description: In this article I’m assembling information about debugging applications on Android, then all possible to anti-debugging techniques and how they can be curcumvented (a little spoiler here - almoust always one way üòÄ) .
